sections.comments: If you wish to take the course but do not meet the restrictions, please DO NOT CONTACT THE INSTRUCTOR. You need to waitlist yourself and will find out if you will have assigned seat during the first week of classes or earlier.Only 4th year students can register in this section. Register on the WL if you are a 3rd year student an want to be considered for registration.Civil and Geological engineering students will take CIVL 402 and Biomedical engineering students will take BMEG 455.This course is fully online.

If you wish to take the course but do not meet the restrictions, please DO NOT CONTACT THE INSTRUCTOR. You need to waitlist yourself and will find out if you will have assigned seat during the first week of classes or earlier.Only 4th year students can register in this section. Register on the waitlist if you are a 3rd year student an want to be considered for registration.Civil and Geological engineering students will take CIVL 402 and Biomedical engineering students will take BMEG 455.This courses is fully online.

The term 1 waitlist is now closed. If you need APSC 450 in term 1, please email students@apsc.ubc.ca with the reason you need it in term 1 and included your student number.Please note that 3rd year students will only be considered if there is room. Students who register in this waitlist section are not guaranteed registration in the course. Students will be accomodated into the course provided seats are available. Please check the SSC during the first week of classes to view the registration changes.

Please check the SSC during the first week of classes to view the registration changes.Please note that 3rd year students will only be considered if there is room.

description: Legislation affecting the practice of engineering; ethical principles and responsibilities. Management of engineering enterprises; labour relations, safety and environmental legislation. Restricted to engineering undergraduate students in the final year of their program.
